headline: Buffett's Final Filing: Berkshire Initiates New York Times Stake, Slashes Amazon Position Before CEO Transition
summary: The latest 13F filing from Berkshire Hathaway reveals some of the final position changes made by Warren Buffett as CEO.

raw.headline: Buffett's Final Filing: Berkshire Initiates New York Times Stake, Slashes Amazon Position Before CEO Transition

headline: Lakers governor Jeanie Buss talks year of transition, says father would have supported sale to Mark Walter
summary: Los Angeles Lakers governor Jeanie Buss said new majority owner Mark Walter's access to capital will help the team best compete with the NBA's top franchises.

raw.headline: Lakers governor Jeanie Buss talks year of transition, says father would have supported sale to Mark Walter
raw.summary: Los Angeles Lakers governor Jeanie Buss said new majority owner Mark Walter's access to capital will help the team best compete with the NBA's top franchises.
